import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../../cssss/Student_css/Your_Profile.css'; const ApplicationForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', fatherName: '', motherName: '', address: '', session:'', mobileNo: '', email: '', photo: null, signature: null, xMarks: '', xMarksheet: null, xiiMarks: '', xiiMarksheet: null, state: '', city: '', programType: '', programApplied: '', dob: '', nationality: '', gender: '', maritalStatus: '', religion: '', category: '', subCategory: '', caste: '', fatherOccupation: '', familyIncome: '', fatherContact: '', familyId: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, files } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: files ? files[0] : value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); }; return ( <> {/* Basic Details Section */}

Basic Details

{/* Educational Details Section */} {/*

Educational Details

*/} ); }; export default ApplicationForm; // here you have to generate a no. with plus one that is the application number // of the candidate and store its password with application number in db // after submission you have to change the your profile to " your application is submitted // you can see it in YOUR APPLICATION FORM "
